article_title: Ohioans can be grateful for public records law
article_text:
Don’t miss our news

Get the latest on government waste, fraud, and abuse - directly in your inbox.

og.description: Hey Ohio – your state got a D+ grade in openness and transparency. Too bad it doesn’t reflect how grateful Ohioans should be for their public records law
